title: Update rank level thresholds in Command Center / Dashboard

requirements.text: Update the rank progression thresholds in `frontend/src/utils/rankUtils.ts` to use the new level ranges: E Rank Hunter (Lvl 1–5), D Rank Hunter (Lvl 5–10), C Rank Hunter (Lvl 10–15), B Rank Hunter (Lvl 15–20), A Rank Hunter (Lvl 20–30), S Rank Hunter (Lvl 30–40), SS Rank Hunter (Lvl 40–50), SSS Rank Hunter (Lvl 50–60), Shadow Monarch (Lvl 60+).

quotes:
Lvl 1- 5 - E Rank Hunter
Lvl 5 - 10 - D Rank Hunter
Lvl 10 - 15 - C Rank Hunter
Lvl 15 - 20 - B Rank Hunter
Lvl 20 - 30 - A Rank Hunter
Lvl 30 - 40 - S Rank Hunter
Lvl 40 - 50 - SS Rank Hunter
Lvl 50 - 60 - SSS Rank Hunter
Lvl 60+ :- Shadow Monarch

acceptanceCriteria: A player at level 1 displays 'E Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 5 displays 'D Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 10 displays 'C Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 15 displays 'B Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 20 displays 'A Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 30 displays 'S Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 40 displays 'SS Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 50 displays 'SSS Rank Hunter'.
A player at level 60 or above displays 'Shadow Monarch'.
The RankBadge component on the Dashboard / Command Center page reflects the updated thresholds correctly.

constraints: Only update rank threshold values; do not alter rank label text, color mappings, or any other logic unless required by the threshold change.
nonGoals: Adding new ranks beyond those specified.
Changing rank colors or badge styles.
Modifying backend level or XP logic.
